text:
Saw this on Hacker News. Excellent presentation, well worth a read. But somehow, I feel attacked :sweat_smile:
<http://boringtechnology.club/>

elements.text: Saw this on Hacker News. Excellent presentation, well worth a read. But somehow, I feel attacked

text:
I saw another post like this (possibly it was this?)
Was also written by well over 5 years ago.

Code thesis and metaphor was the same:
Your startup has 3 novelty tokens.
For things that are kinda risky new ideas. Not proven.
IIRC their two examples of things you might spend those coins on were Node and MongoDB.

Today I would say both of those are well proven boring technologies.
